item.description:
Report X-2025011300

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-24
  • City: READING
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Melvin Cusick, 241 Operations Supervisor, contacted Safety regarding a trichloroethylene spill leaking out of the trailer striking the yard entering the street. ES determined the cause of the release was due to a fork lift puncture.

item.title: Report I-2025010091
item.description:
Report I-2025010091

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-01T00:52:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: Pottstown
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: RSI LEASING INC NS TBT
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Butyl Acrylate was being transferrd by pump from tank car to trailer. A control valve was set in the wrong position, allowing product to flow through the system without beiong metered. Additionally, the overfill protection device was set at a level that was too high in the trailer. This allowed the trialer to fill beyond capacity before shutting down the process.
